page.title: 06A School Day.Andrew, Age 11.
page.content: Friday.I wake up at 7.30am,get washed, have sugar puffs and a cup of tea for breakfast,then I get dressed.I put my lunch in my bag and ride to school on my bicycle.After registration we have spellings and english work.At 10.10am we assemble in the hall for religious stories and sing hymns.At 10.30am we have a break,I usually kick a ball about.Then it's mathematics until 12.00pm,when we have our lunch.After eating I might play football or read. In the afternoon we go swimming at St Ivo pool,we either train or play water polo.Returning to school we read until we go home at 3.15pm.At home,I change my clothes,have a drink and then call for my friends.We might go to the river and lark about or just ramble about Holywell.After a meal it's either T.V.,computer,or read until bedtime.
